oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Sheet music covers; Centennial celebrations
Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition (1897 : Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A color aerial view drawing of the Tennessee Centennial of 1897 showing the various buildings, paths, and attractions. The upper left corner of the cover has a black-and-white photograph of Mrs. Van Leer Kirkman, President of the Woman's Board of the Exposition. A handwritten notation, in ink, is near the top of the cover: "June 25, 1897."
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Zabel-Worley Co.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Kenneth D. Rose Sheet Music Collection
